text: DUN DUN DUN. “ Oh baby, baby... ”. In just three seconds... Baby One More Time, which turns 20 this year, announced the arrival of a new superstar : the then 16 - year - old ex - Mouseketeer from Kentwood, Louisiana, Britney Jean Spears. Along with its equally iconic high school - set music video it re - turfed pop, kickstarting an entire sound ( think funk - tinged R & B grooves mixed with Abba melodies ), sweeping aside the dregs of grunge ( sorry, Bush ) and US heartland rock ( bye, Hootie & the Blowfish ), revitalising pop radio and MTV in the process, before cementing its songwriter and co - producer Max Martin as one of
